scripts.export:pull: bash -c "git subtree pull --squash --prefix third-party/WolcenExtractor git@github.com:gabriel-dehan/WolcenExtractor.git master && yarn export:install"
scripts.export:install: bash -c "gem install bundler && cd third-party/WolcenExtractor && bundle install"
scripts.export:cp: bash -c "rm -rf datamine && mkdir datamine && cp \"`cat GAMEPATH`\"/revision.txt datamine.tmp/revision.txt && node ./src/import_datamine.js"
scripts.export: bash -c "cd third-party/WolcenExtractor && ruby src/main.rb extract --source \"`cat ../../GAMEPATH`\" --dest ../../datamine.tmp --only english_xml.pak,umbra.pak,Libs_UI_ && yarn export:cp"
scripts.build-search-index: bash -c "elm make src/BuildSearchIndexCLI.elm --output datamine.tmp/BuildSearchIndexCLI.elm.js && node --experimental-modules src/build-search-index-cli.mjs"
